channel.title: Firmware on Nikita Gusarov

item.title: Coreboot update
item.description: It seems that I’ve taken quite a long time since the last post to return here. Such a long pause is mainly explained by my work on the thesis and participation in the Discrete Choice Analysis (DCA) school organised at EPFL. Probably I should make some posts with a more academic content, but it’s something for future projects. Today I wanted to document the procedure for updating a Coreboot firmware on my X220.
